ygData.subject: Re: Estate of Unrest
ygData.msgSnippet: I made the trip the other night, and it wasn t nearly as nerve wracking as I d expected.  The guards are very easy to avoid, gather shadows is your friend :)
ygData.messageBody:
I made the trip the other night, and it wasn't nearly as nerve wracking as
I'd expected. The guards are very easy to avoid, gather shadows is your
friend :) I did however die to a rather unfortunate pathing bug. There was
a guard IN the water under the docks in Faydwer...imagine my surprise when
my invis wore off at the end of the dock and some guard hit me for 110dmg
from under the water :)


> As a Dark Elf Necro... I would not even advise going there. EVERY guard,
and
> NPC (especially the druids mentioned above) will be KOS. It will be a
> harowing trip. If you make it though, it ids a good place to learn :)
>
> Sonoroud Tomebinder.
